posts.title: Pineapple Conspiracies
posts.text: Some people like pineapple on their pizza. They call themselves Pineappleans.

posts.title: Hershey's Chocolate: They're Tricking You Into Eating It
posts.text: Hershey's is a food-like substance. Everything about it is wrong.
